title: Saar Site
description: Early Dilmun settlement founded as early as 2300 BCE, with the main phase of the town being built around 1900 BCE. The site, which is located in modern Bahrain, continued in use around 100-200 years after the establishment of this main phase.

properties.description: Point based on an OpenStreetMap node representing the Saar Site.
properties.title: OSM location of Saar Site
